data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Saint Andrew, Jamaica will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Andrew, Jamaica
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Saint Andrew, Jamaica to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary: On average, 25 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Saint Andrew, Jamaica.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Saint Andrew, Jamaica.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Saint Andrew who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of New Kingston
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of New Kingston, Saint Andrew, Jamaica.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Saint Andrew, Jamaica. Please, stir the 170,169 believers here to pray for awakening.
Spirit, teach the 170,169 believers in the state of Saint Andrew the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Saint Andrew.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Saint Andrew
location.cities_list: Kingston, New Kingston, Half Way Tree, Constant Spring, Stony Hill
location.cities_list_w_pop: Kingston (937,700), New Kingston (583,958), Half Way Tree (18,552), Constant Spring (12,830), Stony Hill (8,551)
